tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We left all hopes abt the treatment of the child..,Bt the Doctor made sure everything's gonna go smoothly..,we reffered othr hospitals before comg to Dr.Nitin Nayak v just left al hopes bt he just gave a new life to our child..,,Thank u so much..,,The Doctor The Hospital is just awesome n I would surely recommend to Ours...Thank u for d Staff also for giving so mch of response n imprtnts to d patient...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We have been in touch since my son was born as he is 1.5 years old now he is very good as  a person and has lot of patience in explaining and clarifying us for what ever silly questions being asked by us, as my son got operated for vesicostomy , sepsis and pyloplasty and he is doing fine with the treatment under the guidance of Nitin.

Hence I recommend to visit NU hospital if any one has any issues related to urinary or kidney related problems.

I would say thanks a lot for your support in all aspects from the beginning till now.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: **** ********* *** friendly nature with kid which makes comfort feeling for kid . Having patience to respond our queries
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us.

review: We had details discussion with Dr Nitin on the treatment,  each and every aspect of the problem has been discussed in detail with us. Dr Nitin has given special attention to the case, tests conducted after starting medicine has shown positive results. We are happy with the support extended by Nitin Sir.
